Description: Flaring rim sherd of black-glazed pottery krater with decoration in added white paint; on top of rim ivy pattern in white between pairs of incised lines; exterior glazed black with band in added red at top of neck.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1059)
